explains: adj. （动作）敏捷的，灵活的；（思维）机敏的，机灵的；表示项目管理方法的
wordGroup: agile development 敏捷开发；敏捷式软体开发

sentences.en: At 20 years old he was not as strong, as fast, as agile as he is now.
sentences.cn: 在他20岁时，他没有现在这样强壮、迅速、敏捷。

sentences.en: The people who perform this agile feat of acrobatics are rare.
sentences.cn: 能表演这种灵活的杂技技艺的人是罕见的。

sentences.en: What we mentioned above is the core of the agile manufacturing.
sentences.cn: 上面我们提到的是敏捷制造的核心。
